thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 3 of 111
thread.title: John Mullen
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by John Mullen

author: John Mullen
title: John Mullen
text: I had 'Choice Home Warranty' for just over 30 days when I had a drain blockage .. called, set up appointment, man came out, cleared drain in no time .. could not have asked for anything better. While he was here we found that my sump pump was not working properly. Called, set up new appointment for that. Two majors within a week of 'Choice' covering them. I could not be more pleased then I am with them. You cannot do better then this!!!
